snippet: More than 100 women have signed up to drive for SheTaxis in New York City, in Westchester County and on Long Island, but the company says it wants 500 drivers before it accepts passengers.
abstract: SheRides, New York area livery service for women, delays its launch in order to recruit more female drivers; company says it wants to secure 500 drivers before it begins operating in order to avoid delays for potential riders.
lead_paragraph: More than 100 women have signed up to drive for SheTaxis in New York City, in Westchester County and on Long Island, but the company says it wants 500 drivers before it accepts passengers.

headline.main: Needing More Drivers, Taxi Service for Women Delays Start
headline.print_headline: Taxi Service for Women Delays Debut
